result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua Allen Patraw was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joshua Allen Patraw is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joshua Allen Patraw was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "B"], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Court dismisses Count 1.
Defendant to report to Probation today December 1, 2015, bond continues until Defendant reports.
Defendant is eligible for expungement upon successful completion of Probation.

 
In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

miscConds.notes:
$243.00 to be collected by DOC as a condition of probation in Count 2 Case #15CF139.
$200.00 DNA surcharge to be collected by DOC as a condition of probation in Count 2 Case #15CF139.

-Defendant to comply with any other programming as determined by Agent.
-NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with A.K.G. or any other females the Defendant may have a relationship with.
-Pay Supervision fees.

c: Def  & Atty. eif

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA:  Matthew L Hartung DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea DF:  Joshua Allen Patraw appeared. Case called at 11:55. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads G to Ct 2 in 15CF139 removing the domestic enhancer. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 2 in 15CF139 removing the domestic enhancer. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct 1 in 15CF139. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders: Sentence W/H
 1 year probation with conditions:
- Costs and costs of supervision
- DE to comply with any other programming as determined by the agent. 
- DE to have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, AKG or any other females the DE may have a relationship.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  

DE eligible for expungement upon successful completion of probation. 
DE to report to probation today, bond is discharged upon probation sign up.
signed by Def & Atty this date. eif
Status conference at 12-01-2015 11:30 am

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Rohan. ADA:  Matthew L Hartung   DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea   DF:  Joshua Allen Patraw appeared. Case called at 11:36am. Atty. Andrea states there is an agreement. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads NC to Ct 2 in 15CF139. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. DE withdraws plea. Court does not proceed with plea. Bond continues.


  Status conference scheduled for December 1, 2015 at 11:30 am.
signed by Def & Atty this date. eif
filed by ADA Matthew Hartung. eif

ADA Hartung updates the court. Atty. Andrea responds Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands. Waives reading. NG. Waives speedy trial. Atty. Andrea requests a PTC date. Information has been filed. Bonds continue.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 11:30 am.
Filed by ADA Hartung. km
Arraignment at 08-20-2015 11:30 am

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Michael Edward Nieskes DF ATTY: Alex Andrea DF: Joshua Allen Patraw appeared. Case called at 10:57. Atty. Andrea updates the court, DE will waive. Court advises of rights and possible penalties regarding a preliminary hearing.  Court finds DF has freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waived the right to a preliminary hearing, finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Bond continues.  Arraignment scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 11:30 am.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: for substitution of Judge filed by Atty Andrea. eif

- Prior to leaving the courthouse, report to St Croix County Jail for mugshots and fingerprints.

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, A.K.G. dob 8/9/1998.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
CO: TCH for Vlack, DAR: Frank, Clerk: Minot,ADA:  Jennifer Anne Bork   DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea   DF:  Joshua Allen Patraw appeared. Case recalled at 3:26 pm.

Prior to leaving the courthouse, report to St Croix County Jail for mugshots and fingerprints.

-It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,   A.K.G. dob 8/9/1998.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
